channel.title: Need help making NPC talk [pitures included] :)
channel.description:
hi all i want to make a NPC talk but i can't find it to work i already have something i want in server already
[img]http://www.freewebs.com/pokitol/talk%20to%20conductor.bmp[/img] is the guy i want to have to talk
[img]http://www.freewebs.com/pokitol/barrows%20guide.bmp[/img] [img]http://www.freewebs.com/pokitol/options%20to%20choose.bmp[/img] is the guy from wich it was already working in my source
i hope some 1 knows how to make this for that conductor guy in first picture.

item.title: Need help making NPC talk [pitures included] :)
item.dc:creator: @lollie lollie
item.description:
@lollie wrote:

i did that and tryed to change it so it works for the conductor but when i click talk at conductor he doesn’t show the log [br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 01, 2007, 12:19:06 PM[/size][hr] case 1339: sendFrame126("Barrows Guide", 4902); sendFrame126("", 4903); sendFrame126("Hello, Would you like me to", 4904); sendFrame126("take you to the barrows brothers?", 4905); sendFrame126("", 4906); sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4901); sendFrame164(4900); NpcDialogueSend = true; break; 

case 1340:
            sendFrame171(1, 2465);
            sendFrame171(0, 2468);
            sendFrame126("Select an Option", 2460);
            sendFrame126("Yes Please!", 2461);
            sendFrame126("No Thanks.", 2462);	
            sendFrame164(2459);
            NpcDialogueSend = true;
            break;

are the codes they used for that old guy

but if i change it for the conductor it doesn’t work i think i did it wrong this is what i made from it :

case 1341:
            sendFrame126("Gnome Kart", 4902);
            sendFrame126("", 4903);
            sendFrame126("Hello, Would you like me to", 4904);
            sendFrame126("take you to 1 of the other train depots?", 4905);
            sendFrame126("", 4906);
            sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4901);
            sendFrame164(4900);
            NpcDialogueSend = true;
            break;
case 1342:
            sendFrame171(1, 2465);
            sendFrame171(0, 2468);
            sendFrame126("Select an Option", 2460);
            sendFrame126("Yes Please!", 2461);
            sendFrame126("No Thanks.", 2462);	
            sendFrame164(2459);
            NpcDialogueSend = true;
            break;

Read full topic
item.source: Need help making NPC talk [pitures included] :)

item.title: Need help making NPC talk [pitures included] :)
item.dc:creator: @DuhPk DuhPk
item.description:
@DuhPk wrote:

Go into client.java and search “would you like me to take you to the barrows brothers?”

Read full topic
